name: receive(minimumIncompleteLength:maximumLength:completion:)
desc: Schedules a single receive completion handler, with a range indicating how many bytes the handler can receive at one time.
declaration: final func receive(minimumIncompleteLength: Int, maximumLength: Int, completion: @escaping (_ content: Data?, _ contentContext: NWConnection.ContentContext?, _ isComplete: Bool, _ error: NWError?) -> Void)
